item.title: Guitar Roadmap
item.description: Note This article copy from.For recording. The Learning Guitar Roadmap The Roadmap If your starting out at guitar, I’d recommend to tackle two parallel streams of practice at the same time. One is your single note playing and the other is learning chords. Both of these streams should be supplemented by their own theory and techniques. Single Note Playing (爬格子练习) In terms
